title: Ep 241: Dust to Dust w/ Veritasium
itunes:title: Ep 241: Dust to Dust w/ Veritasium
description: Bobby is a bird of paradise. Khaly has a triple eyelid. Gilbert the orangutang. Veritasium explains the complexity of the universe. We talk Chernobyl catfish, aristocrat jam, Schaub's glasses, and Stonestreet stories.
content:encoded: Bobby is a bird of paradise. Khaly has a triple eyelid. Gilbert the orangutang. Veritasium explains the complexity of the universe. We talk Chernobyl catfish, aristocrat jam, Schaub's glasses, and Stonestreet stories.
